title: MongoDB
text: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like documents with optional schemas...

title: MySQL
text: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS).

title: Dotenv
text: Dotenv is a zero-dependency module that loads environment variables from a .env file into process.env. Storing configuration in the environment separate from code is based on The Twelve-Factor App methodology.
